newsitem.title: USA: Sports Club to buy back up to $3 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Sports Club to buy back up to $3 mln shrs.

text.p: Sports Club Co Inc said Wednesday its board had authorized the use of up to $3.0 million for the repurchase of stock.
The purchases are to be made from time to time in the open market or directly from shareholders at prevailing market prices.
Based on the current market value of the stock, the company will be able to repurchase about nine percent of its 11.4 million outstanding shares.
The repurchase will be funded by proceeds from the previously announced sale of the company's interest in The Sports Connection Clubs.

The repurchased shares will be acquired for general corporate purposes which could include, among other purposes, awards under the company's stock-based incentive compensation plans, and the company's stock matching under its employee 401(k) Plan.

Sports Club operates upscale health and fitness clubs. It operates seven clubs in Southern California and Reebok Sports Club/NY in New York City. It has two clubs under development in Valencia, Calif., and Houston.
